txt.en: There are a few ballistae along the perimeter outside of Brockbridge. The enemy wheeled them outside of town and already they have caused much devastation.
Your actions gave the defenders a brief rest from the threat of the siege machines.
Destroying the war-machines allows the towers to be manned without as much risk. The defenders of Brockbridge now have a better chance to hold back the siege.
There are ballistae shooting at the towers and Brockbridge defenders. They must be destroyed.
There are ballistae shooting at the towers and Brockbridge defenders. They must be destroyed.
